description.0: A symbol of a legendary pact, this sharp blade once cut off the peak of a mountain.

0.0: Increases Shield Strength by <cryo>20%</cryo>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <cryo>4%</cryo> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

1.0: Increases Shield Strength by <cryo>25%</cryo>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <cryo>5%</cryo> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

2.0: Increases Shield Strength by <cryo>30%</cryo>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <cryo>6%</cryo> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

3.0: Increases Shield Strength by <cryo>35%</cryo>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <cryo>7%</cryo> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.

4.0: Increases Shield Strength by <cryo>40%</cryo>. Scoring hits on opponents increases ATK by <cryo>8%</cryo> for 8s. Max 5 stacks. Can only occur once every 0.3s. While protected by a shield, this ATK increase effect is increased by 100%.
